section.title: Overview
section.para: This kind of communication is made to allow applications within a page to exchange data. This library is made for broadcasting messages on topic. This is basically based on 3 functions : subscribe, publish and unsubscribe.

When you subscribe to a topic, you receive all the subtopic message. for example, if I subscribe to "/GateIn/application", and an application send a message on "/GateIn/application/map", i will receive it, but if another application send a message on "/GateIn", i will not receive it.

section.title: /GateIn
section.para: It contains all the events generated by the platform.

section.title: /GateIn/portal/notification
section.para: When a message is sent on this topic, a popup message appears on the top right of the screen.

section.title: /GateIn/portal/changeTitle (not implemented yet)
section.para: Send a message on this channel to change (and to be notified) the title of the portal.

section.title: /GateIn/portal/pageLoaded (not implemented yet)
section.para: Receive a message when a page is loaded.

section.title: /GateIn/portal/pageUnloaded (not implemented yet)
section.para: Receive a message when a page is unloaded.

section.title: /GateIn/application/applicationLoaded (not implemented yet)
section.para: Receive a message when an application is loaded in the page.

section.title: /GateIn/application/applicationUnloaded (not implemented yet)
section.para: Receive a message when an application is unloaded in the page.

section.title: Syntax
section.programlisting: subscribe is used to subscribe a callback to a topic *Parameters:* * topic is the topic that will be listened * obj is the context object * funcName is the name of the function of obj to call when a message is received on the topic funcName have to be a function that take an Object in parameter. the event received have this format: {code:javascript} { senderId:senderId, message:message, topic: topic }

publish is used to publish an event to the other subscribers to the given channels *Parameters:* * senderId is a string that identify the sender * topic is the topic that the message will be published * message is the message that's going to be delivered to the subscribers to the topic
section.para: unsubscribe is used to unsubscribe a callback to a topic

listitem.para: topic is the topic that will be unsubscribe
funcName function name givent at the previous subscribe
